Text:
R.I.P

The band came 2 an end, when the guitarplayer past away this summer.
I saw them live in Hell,(1mile south of Trondheim), in june,Great sound!!
The vocal is by the "Madrugada"- leadsinger.

"a gotta have"   ^^

I guess he was both vocals and guitarist for this band. A shame, I think this band could have become really, really big!

RIP

As said, this is a must have! very good music!

biggest loss in norwegian rock history !
R.I.P Robert Bur책s.
Check your facts, the band came to an end when the vocalist in my midnight creeps died last year, and he was also the lead guitarist in Madrugada, and maybe one of norways best guitarists :)
and yes i bought the album :P
